results.definition: a person engaged in one of the learned professions
an authority qualified to teach apprentices
an athlete who plays for pay
engaged in a profession or engaging in as a profession or means of livelihood
examples: the professional man or woman possesses distinctive qualifications
began her professional career after the Olympics

results.definition: engaged in by members of a profession
examples: professional occupations include medicine and the law and teaching

results.definition: characteristic of or befitting a profession or one engaged in a profession
of or relating to or suitable as a profession
examples: a professional field such as law

results.definition: of or relating to a profession
examples: professional equipment for his new office
